title: This Protfolio
description: Don't think alot about it, the project is this portfolio you are browsing

title: Restorant Front end
description: This is a reactive angular project which fetches realtime data with help of ngRx to mentain state and ngx-charts to display the anlysed data

title: Restorant Back end
description: This project contains five services and running database on mongoDb, message broker on kafka and cloud on Netflix Eureka

title: Wages Calculator
description: This is a simple project which reads transactions from a csv and wages fee csv and calculates the wages,It logs each REST CALL result in mongoDb uses spring boot, junit, mongoDb and docker
